Home.title: Transforming Ideas Into Intelligent Systems.
Home.description: Full Stack Developer Specializing in Applied AI. Combining React, Python, and LLMs to create intelligent products  that automate, analyze, and decide.

LocaleSwitcher.switchLocale: Switch to {locale, select, es {Spanish} en {English} other {Unknown}}

About.title: Building The Future of Intelligent Applications
About.p1: I'm Walter Greenwich, a Full Stack Developer who combines modern web development with applied artificial intelligence to create solutions that truly transform operations.
About.p2: My Unique Approach: I don't just build pretty interfaces or scalable backends - I create complete systems where AI solves real business problems. While most developers integrate AI APIs as just another feature, I design AI-first architectures where artificial intelligence is the core engine of the solution.
About.p3: From Science to Code: My scientific background taught me to analyze problems systematically. My sales experience gave me the ability to understand real user needs and communicate technical solutions clearly. Now I apply both perspectives to build products people actually want to use.

Projects.title: Dream it. Build it. Live it
Projects.summary0: Automating WhatsApp message handling using n8n. This system receives messages via WhatsApp webhooks, processes messages with routing logic, and responds automatically based on keywords., and stores the results in a PostgreSQL database for further analysis.
Projects.summary1: Intelligent email classification and analysis using Google Gemini 2.0 Flash. This system automatically categorizes emails, assesses urgency, extracts intent, and suggests actions—going beyond simple rule-based classification.
Projects.summary2: An elegant and efficient movie search platform built with React.js, Appwrite, and Tailwind CSS. It features real-time movie data from the TMDB API and optimized search performance with useDebounce for smooth input handling.
Projects.summary3: A visually appealing and easy-to-use restaurant website built with React.js and Tailwind CSS. It displays the restaurant's menu, photo gallery, and contact information in a clear and accessible way.

Contact.title: Ready To Build Something Extraordinary?
Contact.description1: Have A Project Where AI Can Make A Real Difference?
Contact.description2: I'm not looking for just 'another job'- I'm looking for interesting problems to solve with intelligent technology. If your project needs:
description3: Automation that actually saves time (not just automates for the sake of it).
Systems that process and understand unstructured data.
Applications where AI is fundamental, not just another feature.
A developer who builds the complete product (backend + AI + frontend).
Contact.description4: Let’s talk. I combine clean code with clear communication and a passion for solving complex problems. If you value dedication and tangible results, let’s build something impactful together.
